description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to restore the functionality of critical infrastructure in a resilient manner in the disaster-affected provinces; and to improve the Government of Mozambique's capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an eligible crisis or emergency.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Education and Human Development (MINEDH)
National Directorate of Water Resources Management (DNGRH)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Safeguard Instruments | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months after the EffectiveDate, prepare, adopt and disclose the ESMF, RPF, and IPMP. | Expected Due Date :23-May-2016

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Specialists | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months after the EffectiveDate, recruit a social and environmental specialist each for INIR and MOPHRH-DNA. | Expected Due Date :23-May-2016
